special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy.
descriptions: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness.
descriptions: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy.
descriptions: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The sahuagin makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws or trident.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
